articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to July 7 Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to July 7 Complex
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the July 7 Complex.
					 He first went round the revolutionary museum of the complex and the room devoted to its history.
					
					Looking back with deep emotion on the complex's glorious history of development in which it has advanced along the road of victory and prosperity under the care of President Kim Il Sung, he said that the complex has turned into a reliable giant chemical producer of the country under the wise guidance and meticulous care of the President, adding that his undying revolutionary feats will shine long in the history of the country.
					
					Then he acquainted himself with technological updating and production at the complex, going round its various production processes.
					
					Seeing the new production processes standing imposingly, he said that the appearance of the complex has changed beyond recognition. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the complex has successfully built great structures, products of the spirit of self-reliance, fully meeting the requirements of the IT age.
					
					In recent years the complex has invented dozens of new valuable technologies and introduced them to production to rapidly increase the production of major chemical goods, he said, noting that this spectacular success is the precious fruition of the mental power of the revolutionary workers in our era, who have embodied the principle of collectivism on which they are devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the efforts for the prosperity of the country and the interests of the society and collective.
					
					He set forth important tasks facing the complex.
					
					In order to  boost the production and supply of a variety of chemical products, it is necessary to continue pushing forward technological updating to introduce latest equipment to all production processes of the complex and intensify the drive to introduce new technologies as required by the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science, he stressed.
					
					It is very gratifying that the workers and technicians of the complex have strengthened the Juche character of the chemical industry by establishing a production system relying on locally available raw and other materials and tenaciously conducting scientific researches into cutting down the norm of consumption of raw materials per unit, he noted, underlining the need to pay a deep attention to this work in the future, too.
					
					He also stressed the need for the guiding officials of the complex to scrupulously organize economy in order to give play to producers' creative ingenuity and, at the same time, intensify the campaign for economization, with economic calculation given primary consideration, and thus fully ensure the profitability in the production.
					
					 He called on the party organization and working people's organization of the complex to conduct the organizational and political work in a dynamic manner, keeping pace with the zeal of the workers of the complex to boost the production and, at the same time, further improve the supply service for the workers. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Ju Kyu Chang, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the art squad of Large Combined Unit 264 of the KPA.
					 It put on the stage female solo and pangchang "Arirang of Army-People Unity",  female solo "We Started from Scratch", chorus "We Will Defend the Headquarters of the Revolution at the Cost of Our Lives" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 Through the performance the art squad truthfully represented the invincible might of the KPA and the steadfast faith and will of its servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also strikingly demonstrated the might of the KPA artistes who are creditably performing their sacred mission as buglers in the era of Songun by instilling the ardent love for the Party, the leader, the country and the people into the soldiers.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the art squad not only created successful art pieces vividly reflecting the inexhaustible mental power of the servicepersons but gave a truthful and militant performance.
					
					 He extended thanks to the art squad, highly appreciating its presentation, noting that it was the best of the recent performances given by the art squads of the KPA units as it was of high artistic and educational value.
					
					 He set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and other senior officials of the C.C., the WPK, and general officers and officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Greetings to Guyanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Guyanese President Bharrat Jagdeo Sunday on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the proclamation of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana. 
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Guyana would continue to grow strong, Kim in his message sincerely wished him good health and a big success in his noble work for the prosperity of the country and the welfare of its people.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Feb. 21 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's visit to the People's Republic of China.
					Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Kwang Ho, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the embassy were present there.
					
					 Liu Xiaoming in a speech said that Kim Jong Il visited China to cordially meet General Secretary Hu Jintao and other leaders of the party and government, making a great contribution to the development of the relations between the two parties and countries.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have entered a new phase of development, he noted that this year marks the diamond jubilee of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries and is a year of Sino-Korean friendship.
					
					 He expressed the belief that events in the year of Sino-Korean friendship would successfully be held thanks to the deep concern and positive support of the top leaders and peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech recalled that leaders of the party and state of China warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il visiting China and accorded him warmest hospitality with utmost sincerity and made all efforts to ensure his successful visit.
					
					 The signal success and immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed by visiting China would shine forever along with the history, he stressed, expressing the belief that the DPRK-China friendship would grow stronger thanks to the joint efforts of the two parties and peoples this year, a year of DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Director-General of IIJI Interviewed
articles.content:
Director-General of IIJI Interviewed
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- I am convinced that only victory and glory will be in store for the heroic Korean people working hard to build a rich and powerful nation.
					Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said this when interviewed by KCNA on Feb. 20, while staying in the DPRK.
					
					2012 will be a very significant year as it will commemorate the centenary of birth of President
						Kim Il Sung, he noted, and continued:
					
					The Korean people rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il are making a dynamic drive to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in the above-said year.
					
					The adherents to the Juche idea are extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their endeavors to defend and glorify socialist Korea and build a thriving country true to the behest of the President.
					
					Kim Jong Il has creditably carried forward the President's revolutionary cause. The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a great country because it is holding in high esteem Kim Jong Il who has unshakable faith, indomitable will and matchless courage and grit.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Move to Further Deteriorate Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Move to Further Deteriorate Inter-Korean Relations Assailed
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak's recent drastic replacement of the members of what he called the "advisory council for unification" with confrontation maniacs is intended to further escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen this year than last year in a bid to throw the inter-Korean relations into a bottomless abyss of confrontation and collapse.
					Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					Recently, Lee blustered that he would "adhere to the principle governing the inter-Korean relations", "would not unnecessarily make haste" and "he is ready to cooperate".
					
					The "principle" touted by Lee while disregarding and negating the inter-Korean joint declarations amounts to a criminal act of mocking at and insulting the nation.
					
					He did not let every chance pass by to assert the "adherence to the above-said principle" as if he were an advocate of principle. His "policy towards the north" is not based on any principle. It is nothing but a treacherous and anti-reunification policy as it brought the inter-Korean relations to stalemate and bedeviled them though they had favorably developed since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					Lee's loud-mouthed "cooperation" is nothing but sophism to deceive the public at home and abroad.
					
					The relations between the north and the south are bound to go from bad to worse as traitor Lee replaced members of the above-said "council" and mechanisms handling issues of inter-Korean relations with confrontation maniacs. All Koreans will not be able to escape the holocaust of a new war, a nuclear war, should Lee keep pursuing confrontation, further bedeviling the said relations.
					
					In order to prevent this national disaster it is necessary for all the Koreans to wage an anti-Lee Myung Bak nationwide struggle. This is the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Subservience to U.S. Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Subservience to U.S. Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea called a press conference outside the puppet Defence Ministry on February 13 to denounce the south Korean military warmongers' subservience to the U.S.
					 A press release read out there recalled that the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the south Korean army on Feb. 11 at a "briefing on the U.S. transfer of the right to command wartime operations" said the south Korea-U.S. "annual security consultative council" and "military committee" would be kept as they are and the "headquarters for military cooperation" be newly created.
					
					 It denounced the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the south Korean army and the Command of the U.S. forces in south Korea for announcing that "a mechanism for cooperation in performing different functions" would be newly set up between them to permanently operate a "joint intelligence gathering center," etc.
					
					All the facts prove that the U.S. forces will command all the combined operations even after the transfer of "the right to command wartime operations" to the south Korean army and, furthermore, it will result in letting the commander of the U.S. forces regain the key element of the "right to command peacetime operations," it deplored.
					
					Bitterly denouncing such traitorous behavior of the military to increase south Korea's military dependence upon the U.S., the press release demanded the military authorities fully disclose the truth about the above-said dealing and stop such submission to the U.S.

articles.title: Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Diplomatic Missions abroad
articles.content:
Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Diplomatic Missions abroad
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Figures of different circles in various countries visited the DPRK embassies and missions in their countries during the period from February 3 to 17 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. Among them were the chairperson of the Political Coordinating Council of "Patriots of Russia" Party, mayors and vice-mayors and chairmen and vice-chairmen of assemblies of Nakhodka, Partizansk, Pokino and Artyom Cities, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, the secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the minister of Information and Communications of Nepal, the chairman of the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, the president of the National Press Club of Nepal, the chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the general secretary of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, the executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the director of the "Gor King-Erdene" Institute of Teachers of Mongolia, the chairman of the Malaysia Chinese Association, the president of the Malaysian People's Movement, general directors and directors of Malaysian companies including M.K.P. Company and Special Auto Service Company, the chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length photographs of them standing together before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: February Holiday Observed by Czech Organizations
articles.content:
February Holiday Observed by Czech Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) --The  Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea jointly published the first issue of bulletin "Paektusan"  on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin edited articles under diverse titles such as "Appearance of Pyongyang", "Scenery of Mt. Paektu" and "Socialist Korea and Democracy." 
					
					 The bulletin in its articles introduced at length that Pyongyang has turned into a modern city of people under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of the revolution associated with the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons, is visited by a large number of people from the world. It also carried an article telling about the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Roots of the Single-Minded Unity of the DPRK" recalled that in the early days of his revolutionary activities the President fathered the Juche idea that the popular masses are the masters of the revolution and construction and they are also their motive force and established the great tradition of the single-minded unity.
					
					Noting that the tradition of the single-minded unity in the DPRK has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, the article stressed that he has developed in depth the Songun idea based on the Juche idea and formulated the Songun policy as a main political mode under socialism and weathered adversities with the might of Songun.
					
					Giving a detailed account of the fact that Kim Jong Il has made endless journeys of Songun for the happiness of the people, the bulletin said: The single-minded unity of the DPRK has been cemented by the relations of the sense of moral obligation existing between the leader who considers it as his greatest pleasure to devote himself to the people and the people who deem it as conscience to remain intensely loyal to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Figures of Britain and a regional organization released statements on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Michael Chant, secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (MarxistÔºçLeninist), in a statement on Feb. 13 noted that Kim Jong Il has converted the DPRK into an impregnable fortress as it has defence capability strong enough to beat back any aggression by imperialists. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has honorably carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We set store by the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and regard the victory achieved by the WPK as our own.
					
					 The acting director for Political Affairs and International Relations of the Pan-African Movement in a statement on Feb. 12 highly praised Kim Jong Il as a great man who has performed immortal exploits for the cause of global independence by propounding outstanding ideas and theories and making revolutionary practices.
					
					The statement said that the Songun policy is a policy which firmly protects and fully meets the requirements of the popular masses for independence and their interests and prepares them as the most revolutionary and militant and noblest people, adding that the Songun policy pursued by
						Kim Jong Il will always triumph.
